body_html:
Okay, I have finished benchmarking and have set the threshold for the batch_size to be 16, to enable NNPACK. I also bound the inference NNPACK call, although it will not be enabled for now as it relies upon batch_size=1 - but I wanted to check and see what the difference was.

I think this is ready to go, cc @soumith

body:
Okay, I have finished benchmarking and have set the threshold for the `batch_size` to be 16, to enable NNPACK. I also bound the inference NNPACK call, although it will not be enabled for now as it relies upon `batch_size=1` - but I wanted to check and see what the difference was.

I think this is ready to go, cc @soumith
